entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
